main event: On 10 August 1950, multiple Girl Scouts and their leaders observed an unidentified object shaped like a cigar or zeppelin in the sky while sitting around a campfire.
interesting points: The object was reported to roar towards the witnesses and appeared to break in two before rejoining,The girls were terrified and described the brilliance of the object as awesome,Over 6 individuals, including the scout leaders, confirmed the sighting,The scouts noted that the object did not resemble traditional flying saucers,The incident occurred at Camp Dequindre in Southfield Township around 10 PM.
sighted object: unidentified object shaped like a cigar or zeppelin
witness description: Girl Scouts aged 12 to 14 and their leaders
